profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_1::g: Photograph other people reacting to your characters actions.
Photograph the people who know and are interested in your character.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_4::g: Photograph another important but different moment your character experiences during their story.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_5::g: Photograph a very different moment from before your character experiences during their story.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_6::g: Photograph your character interacting with people important to them.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_0::g: Show your character arriving to the location.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_2::g: Capture your character at a dramatic moment in their story, should sum up the story.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_7::g: Photograph your character as the stories climax, or the dramatic finish occurs.
profile_highlights_photo::text_card_0::t: If there are more than three important moments, you should add clips to include them.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_0::g: Show a wide shot of the entire location itself.
profile_highlights_photo::clip_card_3::g: Photograph the most important moment that illustrates your character during their story.
